Items Not Affecting Characteristics
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: Items Not Affecting Characteristics
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, December 13, 2001 - 12:34 pm:

Please note, this chart has a companion message thread in Misc. Q&A. If you find more items, post them there, and a moderator will edit them into this chart and give you credit.

This chart is of items not gotten in the shop, which don't affect characteristics


Item NameDecriptionFound
BananaLazy monster Ape's banana. Makes your monster lazy.silver box
Bajarl PotA pot that contains the spirit monster Bajarl.Gold Box
Black PearlJewelry made rare oysters. Also for medicine.Dropped by stray monster after defeat.
CoralAccessory from the ocean bed. Also for medicine.Silver Box
CrystalPretty stones excavated from caves. Has some value.Dropped by stray monster after defeat
DiamondA rare jewel. Has great value.Dropped by stray monster after defeat.
Disc FragFragment of a monster that looks just like a Saucer StoneGold Box
Ghost StikStick that belongs to a Ghost?
MirrorMirror with the power of the legendary monster Majin.Tourney Box
Mint CandyRefreshing Candy. Great to reduce stress.Honey Candy + Mint Leaf
Mint LeafRefreshing mint leaf works on stress. Also for medicine.Iron Box
Mock SeedSeed of the monster Mock who was born from an old tree.Dropped by stray monster after defeat.
Nuts OilNuts oil removes fatigue from monsters. Silver Box
Silver CupWater from this cup removes minor fatigue. Effects when you own.Storyline Event
Torles WtrMineral water from overseas removes monster fatigue.Iron Box
WhipA whip from the mysterious monster DoodleGold Box
Wind FluteMakes monsters cry like babies with its sad sounds. Effects when you own.Storyline event.


By: John Hawley, Trickster, Hellraiser83, Ruiner, Matthew Carter, _darkarchon, Strunks.
